entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
